mapper.insert: MERGE INTO impbalance USING ( SELECT CAST(#{mcsCapitalsourceId} as integer), CAST(#{balance} as decimal), CAST(#{changedate} as timestamp) ) AS source (source_mcs_capitalsourceid, source_balance, source_changedate) ON (mcs_capitalsourceid = source.source_mcs_capitalsourceid) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE set balance = source.source_balance WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (mcs_capitalsourceid ,balance ,changedate ) VALUES (source_mcs_capitalsourceid ,source_balance ,source_changedate )
